## web3.js package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Connection](./web3.js.connection.md) | A connection to a fullnode JSON RPC endpoint. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [EpochInfo](./web3.js.epochinfo.md) | Information about the current epoch. |
|  [InflationGovernor](./web3.js.inflationgovernor.md) | Network Inflation (see [proposed schedule](https://docs.solana.com/inflation/inflation_schedule)<!-- -->) |
|  [PerfSample](./web3.js.perfsample.md) | A performance sample |
|  [RecentBlockhash](./web3.js.recentblockhash.md) | Recent string blockhash and fee calculator |
|  [RpcResponseAndContext](./web3.js.rpcresponseandcontext.md) | RPC response which includes the slot at which the operation was evaluated. |
|  [SignatureStatusConfig](./web3.js.signaturestatusconfig.md) | Configuration object for changing signature status query behavior. |
|  [Version](./web3.js.version.md) | Version info for a node. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Commitment](./web3.js.commitment.md) | The level of commitment desired when querying state.
```
'max':          Query the most recent block which has been finalized by the cluster
'recent':       Query the most recent block which has reached 1 confirmation by the connected node
'root':         Query the most recent block which has been rooted by the connected node
'single':       Query the most recent block which has reached 1 confirmation by the cluster
'singleGossip': Query the most recent block which has reached 1 confirmation according to votes seen in gossip

```
 |
|  [TransactionSignature](./web3.js.transactionsignature.md) | Transaction signature as Base58 string. |
